SCTX:
Begin DagothTaunt_1

short done

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( done == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetStandingPC == 0 )
	;plays when you walk across this architecture
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex C3_DestroyDagoth >= 50 )
	;don't play if game over, man
	return
endif

if ( Player->GetItemCount "wraithguard" == 0 )
	;don't play if player doesn't have tools
	return
endif

Player->Say  "vo\misc\Dagoth Ur Taunt 1.mp3" "Come, Nerevar. Friend or traitor, come. Come and look upon the Heart, and Akulakhan. And bring Wraithguard... I have need of it."
set done to 1

End
